metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39321 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: Processing an incomplete post-handshake message for a QUIC connection can cause a panic.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Packages built using golang need to be rebuilt once the vulnerability has been fixed. This CVE entry does not list packages that need rebuilding outside of the main repository or the Ubuntu variants with PPA overlays.

criterions.comment: golang-1.21 package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
